vlive.korean: [옷 가게 주인의 손실은 얼마인가?] [How much is the loss of this tailor?] View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.94
vlive.english: [How much is the loss of this tailor?]

vlive.korean: [공격적인] [원금 손실나면] 누가 책임져 줄 거예요? [If we have a loss] Who will take responsibility? 듣기 View video 컨버전스티비 (CONS TV) : [커먼스쿨]서울여자상업고등학교 ep6(홍현희X정세운X강율)
vlive.english: [If we have a loss] Who will take responsibility?

vlive.korean: [목돈은 분산투자가 원금 손실 없다는 점] 따로 나눠서 투자를 하시는 게... [To avoid loss of money] It's better to invest in multiple banks. 듣기 View video 컨버전스티비 (CONS TV) : [커먼스쿨]서울여자상업고등학교 ep6(홍현희X정세운X강율)
vlive.english: [To avoid loss of money] It's better to invest in multiple banks.

vlive.korean: [뭔 손실?] 근손실이 뭐예요? [What loss?] What's "geunsonsil"? 듣기 View video 한뼘TV : [방판소년단 EP31] UNB 고갱님 감사합니다~ 사상 최고 판매액 달성!
사실 그 점액질을 많이 손실하면서 살고 있어요. so they're actually living their lives while losing a lot of phlegm. 듣기 View video KIM DONG WAN : 2018 신화 활동 마무리
vlive.english: so they're actually living their lives while losing a lot of phlegm.

examples.korean: compensation for loss of earnings caused by the accident 발음듣기 그 사고로 인한 소득 손실에 대한 보상 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: compensation for loss of earnings caused by the accident 발음

examples.korean: The drought has led to widespread loss of life. 발음듣기 그 가뭄은 대대적인 인명 손실로 이어졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The drought has led to widespread loss of life. 발음

examples.korean: I received $1000 in recompense for loss of earnings. 발음듣기 나는 소득 손실에 대한 배상금으로 1 000달러를 받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I received $1000 in recompense for loss of earnings. 발음

examples.korean: We made a loss on the deal. 발음듣기 우리는 그 거래로 손실을 보았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We made a loss on the deal. 발음

examples.korean: Our loss is their gain. 발음듣기 우리의 손실이 그들에게는 이득이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Our loss is their gain. 발음
